meanings.definition: A group of extinct reptiles that were the ancestors of modern crocodiles and dinosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The thecodonts roamed the earth millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thecodonts to learn about ancient reptiles.
meanings.sent3: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on thecodonts.
meanings.sent4: In movies, thecodonts are often portrayed as fierce predators.
meanings.sent5: Children love reading about thecodonts in books about dinosaurs.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the thecodonts.
meanings.sent1: The thecodonts fossils provided valuable information about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent2: The researcher focused on thecodonts features in the study.
meanings.sent3: The professor's thecodonts joke made the class laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as thecodonts scales.
meanings.sent5: The ancient landscape was filled with thecodonts creatures.
